parameters.name: AcceptChanges
parameters.description: True to save your edits, false to discard them

title: ISketchManager.EndEditSketchBlock
description: Saves or discards your edits of the block and then ends the current editing session of this block.

parameters.name: AcceptChanges
parameters.description: True to save your edits, false to discard them

remarks:
Use
ISketchManager::EditSketchBlock
to put the block in edit mode.
See
Block Definitions and Block Instances
for details.
